text: Tomadera madhye yara imana eneche ebam satkarma karache allah tadera oyada karachena ye, tini niscaya'i tadera prthibite pratinidhitba dana karabena, yemana tini pratinidhitba dana karechilena tadera yara chila edera purbabarti, ara abasya'i tini tadera jan'ya supratisthita karabena tadera dharma ya tini tadera jan'ya manonita karechena, ara niscaya'i tadera bhaya-bhitira pare tadera jan'ye badale anabena nirapatta. Tara amara'i ebadata karabe, amara sange an'ya ka'uke sarika karabe na. Ara ye ke'u era pare akrtajnata dekhabe -- tahale tara nijera'i hacche sima-langhanakari.
